import React from "react"; import styled from "@emotion/styled"; import theme from "../styles/theme"; const Container = styled.article` width: ${theme.width.tablet}; background-color: #f1f2f4; align-self: center; @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { width: ${theme.width.mobile}; } `; const About = () => { return (

I love to make impact with awesome products.

I’m currently working as a design engineer at TNG and Product Designer at BE THE LIGHT

Work Experience

May KING

Founder, Design Instructor · Jan 2018 ~ Dec 2019

TNG

Design Engineer · Jan 2020 ~ Present

BE THE LIGHT

Product Designer · Mar 2021 ~ Present

Skills

Design Engineering
Coding
Digital Product Design

Clients worked with

Suwon Hi-tech Highschool

Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering · Mar 2017 ~ Jan 2020
); }; export default About;
